properties.entry: INSERT INTO PAYMENT VALUES(SEQ_PAYMENT.NEXTVAL, ?, NULL, NULL, SYSDATE, NULL, NULL, ?, ?, ?)
SELECT PAYMENT_TID FROM PAYMENT WHERE PAYMENT_RESERVATION_NO = ? AND PAYMENT_STATUS_CODE = ?
UPDATE PAYMENT SET PAYMENT_AID = ?, PAYMENT_METHOD = ?, PAYMENT_APPROVED = ?, PAYMENT_STATUS_CODE = ? WHERE PAYMENT_TID = ? AND PAYMENT_RESERVATION_NO = ? AND PAYMENT_USER_NO = ?
